mapper.select: SELECT ba.* FROM (SELECT a.*, t.register_date as bm_register_date FROM article a INNER JOIN (SELECT b.member_id, b.article_id, b.register_date FROM `bookmark` b WHERE member_id = #{memberId}) t ON a.id = t.article_id) ba LEFT JOIN comment c ON ba.id = c.article_id ORDER BY ba.bm_register_date DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{numOfRecords}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `bookmark`(member_id, article_id, register_date) VALUES(#{memberId}, #{articleId}, NOW())
